Why is Skelton purple???

Sentar is reflecting light onto Skelton.

Sentar is reflecting light onto Skelton.

And I'm guessing the one on the left is Erin??

So, I downloaded the mod and stuff, put it in gamedata, and I wanted to install Kerbal Universe. However, whenever I started up KSP, the game wouldn't show the little box where it says what mods to run, so I couldn't get the mod to work.

Do I have to put it in a different directory, or a different mod? Because Kerbal Universe says to download this one.

Sorry I'm such a noob but other mods I've downloaded never had this much difficulty. Cheers if anyone could respond

So, I downloaded the mod and stuff, put it in gamedata, and I wanted to install Kerbal Universe. However, whenever I started up KSP, the game wouldn't show the little box where it says what mods to run, so I couldn't get the mod to work.

Do I have to put it in a different directory, or a different mod? Because Kerbal Universe says to download this one.

Sorry I'm such a noob but other mods I've downloaded never had this much difficulty. Cheers if anyone could

respond

You put in the folder along with the sentar stuff again keep in mind this mod is very outdated.

You put in the folder along with the sentar stuff again keep in mind this mod is very outdated.

Is this the only mod that these planet mods rely on or are their other mods released/in progress?

One more thing, where do I put the sln file? I was stumped by that lol

Is there any way for me to get a version of Planetfactory that's compatible with .23.5? I've been looking everywhere, and I can't find jack. You guys got backups or something?

Sentar? I believe I don't know what this is

Is this the only mod that these planet mods rely on or are their other mods released/in progress?

One more thing, where do I put the sln file? I was stumped by that lol

If you people can't figure out the difference between source code and the actual mods, don't install mods. Sentar is a planet added by this mod.

Is there any way for me to get a version of Planetfactory that's compatible with .23.5? I've been looking everywhere, and I can't find jack. You guys got backups or something?

........

It is compatible with 0.23 and any version after that.

Edited September 22, 2014 by _Augustus_

Oh god, I am so, so stupid lol.

Anyway, many thanks for the help even though I was a bit of an imbecile about it lol.

Thanks though, I appreciate it, can't wait to play Urania and other planets!

Hello, guys!

I'm new in this mod, so I have a few questions.

Firstly, how can I make my planet/star BIG? I really want to make a Jupiter scaled gas giant. But when I set it's radius to 700000000 meters nothing happens.

Secondly, how can I make a gas giant with ocean?

Hello, guys!

I'm new in this mod, so I have a few questions.

Firstly, how can I make my planet/star BIG? I really want to make a Jupiter scaled gas giant. But when I set it's radius to 700000000 meters nothing happens.

Secondly, how can I make a gas giant with ocean?

Hello!

First off, you need to change BOTH the radius things iirc, and I wouldn't recommend making it 700000000 meters in radius, it might be as wide as the entire Kerbol system

And gas giants don't have oceans, or a solid surface for that matter.

Hello!

First off, you need to change BOTH the radius things iirc, and I wouldn't recommend making it 700000000 meters in radius, it might be as wide as the entire Kerbol system

And gas giants don't have oceans, or a solid surface for that matter.

1) Ok

But what about the Real Solar System? How does it make planets bigger? Can I use it?

2) But could I choose the Laythe for template and make my planet's atmosphere like Jool's?

1) Ok

But what about the Real Solar System? How does it make planets bigger? Can I use it?

2) But could I choose the Laythe for template and make my planet's atmosphere like Jool's?

1) I think real solar system works fine with planet factory, but you'd need to put all the planets you make farther out and maybe bigger.

2) it'll act like it has an extremely thick atmosphere, but pretty much the same i guess, ive never tried it, but good luck taking off and getting to orbit.

I've been trying to modify planets by replacing their textures, and everything works except I can't figure out how to create a custom "(planet)_normal.png" and the their orbit is always strait with the description "Na meters/sec". Help?

The normal map can be exported for planets in game. If you use ctrl 9 it brings up a menu, you want to teleport using that menu to the planet, and then hit the scaled space button. This will hang your computer for a few minutes. Then go into the file and remove the _ at the end of the exported files and you are good to go
How do you create oblate planets?

How do you create oblate planets?

Look at innacessable's config there should be something like PQSoblate or something like that.

Is this compatible with 0.25?
I dont think so
Im using it with .25 64 bit and its working ok. Some times I cant "go to" a planet or moon but I just us Hyperedit for that.

Im using it with .25 64 bit and its working ok. Some times I cant "go to" a planet or moon but I just us Hyperedit for that.

I finally downloaded 0.25 and gave it a try. Seemed to work okay for me. But I didn't test all that much. Can someone give me details on whats broke? Might be I can fix it.

Krag.

I finally downloaded 0.25 and gave it a try. Seemed to work okay for me. But I didn't test all that much. Can someone give me details on whats broke? Might be I can fix it.

Krag.

I'm not sure if it's trouble with PF or other mods, but when I tried it on .25 (64bit, mind you, I know it's already a bit crash-happy), I was also using Kethane, and the Kethane overlay started doing that thing it used to do in map mode that got fixed a long while ago. When you moved the map around it (the whole map) would jitter around a lot and the Kethane overlay would shrink to a small ball in the center of the map regardless of whatever celestial you were viewing.

I then tried Karbonite as an alternate resource system and found that with PF:CE installed the orange resource hotspots never showed up. Even on stock planets (I'm aware ORS doesn't procedurally generate resources (yet)). Can't remember if it broke resource extraction though.

I'm not sure if these are problems with PF itself or interactions it has with other mods. Sorry I can't be more specific.

I'm gonna test it out again soon as it's done downloading and see what it does with .25 for me.
